title: All Falls Down
tags: 2010 Assembly Demo glitch SceneOrgAwards video Vocals Windows
info:
Used in "Ceasefire (all falls down..)", which ranked 2nd in the demo compo at Assembly 2010.

Lyrics:

I believe there might come a time
When the earth will swallow us
Tidal waves will crash our towns
Sending out a million cries

[chorus]
And it could all fall down
And it could all fall now
We could all fall apart in crashing cars
And never be right here

Who will stand when the comets drop
Through a sky that looks down on us
Equality will be crowned that day
While leaving us in a guilty rage

[chorus]
